warnings.open: You are about to delete an open purchase order. This action cannot be undone.

warnings.partial: ⚠️ WARNING: This purchase order has been partially received.
warnings.partial_info: Deleting will reverse the PO but does NOT reverse item receipts. Consider voiding receipts first if needed.

warnings.open: You are about to delete an open (unpaid) bill. This action cannot be undone.

warnings.partial: ⚠️ WARNING: This bill has been partially paid.
warnings.partial_info: Deleting will reverse the bill but does NOT reverse payments. Consider voiding partial payments first if needed.

consequences.title: This will:
consequences.delete_bill: Delete bill and all line items

system_admin.title: System Administration
system_admin.reset_description: Clears ALL transactional data while preserving master data (items, vendors, customers, GL accounts).

business.page_subtitle: Configure your business type and manage modules

module_management.heading: Module Management
module_management.description: Finance is always enabled. Enable other modules based on your business needs.

info_box.title: ℹ️ About Business Types
info_box.description: Switching business types changes which modules are visible in the application. Your data remains intact when switching.
info_box.point1: 🏭 Manufacturing: Mixing, sublimation, production lines, recipes
info_box.point2: 🛒 Retail: Point of sale, inventory management

switch_modal.title: Switch Business Type?
switch_modal.description: Changing your business type will affect which modules are visible in the application.
switch_modal.warning: Warning: Data from disabled modules won't be visible, but won't be deleted. You can switch back anytime.

inventory_migration.page_subtitle: Migrate existing inventory to multi-location warehouse system

what_this_does.heading: What this migration does:
what_this_does.point1: Creates a default warehouse record (ID: 1) and location (ID: 1)
what_this_does.point2: Links all existing items to the default location
what_this_does.point3: Transfers current stock quantities to the new location system
what_this_does.point4: Enables warehouse tracking for future transactions
what_this_does.point5: Preserves all historical data and FIFO layers

inventory_migration.next_steps: Next Steps: You can now use warehouse-based inventory tracking and transfers between locations.

warning.alert_title: ⚠️ This action will permanently delete all test transactional data.
warning.alert_description: This operation cannot be undone. Ensure you have a backup before proceeding.
warning.use_case: Typical use case: Transitioning from testing phase to production (go-live).

what_happens.heading: What will happen next:
what_happens.step1: All test transactions will be deleted
what_happens.step2: Inventory quantities will be reset to zero
what_happens.step3: GL account balances will be reset
what_happens.step4: Your system will be ready for production use

processing.title: Processing reset...
processing.description: This may take a few minutes. Please do not close this window.

success.title: Reset Successfully Completed
success.description: Your system is now ready for production use.

next_steps.heading: Next Steps
next_steps.step1: Enter opening balances for GL accounts

inventory_resync.description: This will delete all existing inventory layers and rebuild them from vendor bills, then apply FIFO deductions for all sales invoices.
inventory_resync.confirm_dialog: This will rebuild ALL inventory layers from vendor bills and sales history. Continue?
